symptoms: high temperature, hacking cough, throat pain, runny nose, body aches, profound fatigue, headache
treatment: rest, hydration, over-the-counter pain relievers, antiviral drugs
symptoms_normalized: fever, cough, sore throat, runny nose, muscle aches, profound fatigue, headache

symptoms: sneezing, nasal discharge, scratchy throat, congestion, mild cough, feeling unwell
treatment: rest, hydration, decongestants, vitamin c, throat lozenges
symptoms_normalized: sneezing, runny nose, sore throat, congestion, mild cough, feeling unwell

symptoms: fever or chills, dry cough, tiredness, loss of taste or smell, shortness of breath, muscle aches, sore throat, headache
treatment: isolation, rest, fluids, medical attention if severe, antiviral medication like paxlovid
symptoms_normalized: fever or chills, dry cough, fatigue, loss of taste or smell, shortness of breath, muscle aches, sore throat, headache

symptoms: severe throbbing headache, nausea, vomiting, extreme sensitivity to light, extreme sensitivity to sound, seeing auras or flashing lights
treatment: pain relievers, triptans, dark quiet room, sleep, hydration
symptoms_normalized: severe throbbing headache, nausea, vomiting, extreme sensitivity to light, extreme sensitivity to sound, seeing auras or flashing lights

symptoms: sneezing fits, itchy and watery eyes, runny or stuffy nose, itchy skin, rash, wheezing, post-nasal drip
treatment: antihistamines, avoid allergens, nasal corticosteroid sprays, allergy shots
symptoms_normalized: sneezing fits, itchy and itchy eyes, runny or stuffy nose, itchy skin, rash, wheezing, post-nasal drip

symptoms: difficulty breathing, wheezing sound when exhaling, chest tightness or pain, coughing fits, especially at night or early morning
treatment: rescue inhaler (albuterol), long-term controller inhalers (corticosteroids), avoiding triggers
symptoms_normalized: shortness of breath, wheezing sound when exhaling, chest tightness or pain, cough fits, especially at night or early morning
normalized_symptoms_list: especially at night or early morning

symptoms: extreme thirst (polydipsia), frequent urination (polyuria), unexplained weight loss, fatigue, blurred vision, slow-healing sores
treatment: lifelong insulin therapy, regular blood sugar monitoring, carbohydrate counting, diet management
symptoms_normalized: extreme thirst (polydipsia), frequent urination (polyuria), unexplained weight loss, fatigue, blurred vision, slow-healing sores

symptoms: increased thirst, frequent urination, fatigue, blurred vision, slow-healing sores, numbness or tingling in hands or feet, frequent infections
treatment: diet management, exercise, oral medications (metformin), insulin therapy, weight management
symptoms_normalized: increased thirst, frequent urination, fatigue, blurred vision, slow-healing sores, numbness or tingling in hands or feet, frequent infections
normalized_symptoms_list: numbness or tingling in hands or feet

symptoms: often asymptomatic (silent killer), persistent headache, dizziness, nosebleeds, blurred vision, shortness of breath in severe cases
treatment: lifestyle changes (low-sodium diet, exercise, stress reduction), antihypertensive medication
symptoms_normalized: often asymptomatic (silent killer), persistent headache, dizziness, nosebleeds, blurred vision, shortness of breath in severe cases
normalized_symptoms_list: shortness of breath in severe cases

symptoms: crushing chest pain or pressure, pain radiating to the left arm/jaw/back, shortness of breath, cold sweat, nausea, lightheadedness
treatment: emergency medical attention (call 911), aspirin, nitroglycerin, oxygen therapy, angioplasty or bypass surgery
symptoms_normalized: crushing chest pain or pressure, pain radiating to the left arm/jaw/back, shortness of breath, cold sweat, nausea, lightheadedness
normalized_symptoms_list: pain radiating to the left arm/jaw/back

symptoms: sudden numbness or weakness in the face, arm, or leg (especially on one side), sudden confusion, trouble speaking or understanding, sudden dizziness, loss of balance, sudden severe headache
treatment: emergency medical attention (call 911 immediately), clot-busting drugs (tpa), endovascular procedures, rehabilitation
symptoms_normalized: sudden numbness or weakness in the face, arm, or leg (especially on one side), sudden confusion, trouble speaking or understanding, sudden dizziness, loss of balance, sudden severe headache
normalized_symptoms_list: sudden numbness or weakness in the face

symptoms: cycles of high fever, shaking chills, and profuse sweating, headache, muscle aches, fatigue, nausea, vomiting
treatment: antimalarial drugs (artemisinin-based combination therapies), rest, hydration, paracetamol for fever
symptoms_normalized: cycles of high fever, shaking chills, and profuse sweating, headache, muscle aches, fatigue, nausea, vomiting

symptoms: prolonged high fever, severe weakness, stomach pain, headache, loss of appetite, rose-colored spots (rash)
treatment: antibiotics (ciprofloxacin, azithromycin), rehydration therapy, rest, soft diet
symptoms_normalized: prolonged high fever, severe weakness, stomach pain, headache, loss of appetite, rose-colored spots (rash)

symptoms: persistent cough lasting more than 3 weeks (sometimes with blood), unintended weight loss, night sweats, fever, fatigue, chest pain
treatment: long course of multiple antibiotics (6-9 months), rest, good nutrition, isolation initially
symptoms_normalized: cough lasting more than 3 weeks (sometimes with blood), unintended weight loss, night sweats, fever, fatigue, chest pain
normalized_symptoms_list: cough lasting more than 3 weeks (sometimes with blood)

symptoms: fatigue, nausea, jaundice (yellowing skin/eyes), dark urine, clay-colored stool, abdominal pain, loss of appetite, low-grade fever
treatment: rest, hydration, avoiding alcohol, supportive care (usually resolves on its own), vaccination for prevention
symptoms_normalized: fatigue, nausea, jaundice (yellowing skin/eyes), dark urine, clay-colored stool, abdominal pain, loss of appetite, low-grade fever

symptoms: fatigue, jaundice, dark urine, abdominal pain, nausea, joint pain, loss of appetite
treatment: antiviral medications for chronic cases, rest, avoiding alcohol, vaccination for prevention
symptoms_normalized: fatigue, jaundice, dark urine, abdominal pain, nausea, joint pain, loss of appetite

symptoms: often asymptomatic for years, fatigue, jaundice, dark urine, abdominal pain, nausea, poor appetite, spider-like blood vessels on skin
treatment: antiviral medications (daas) can cure most cases, liver monitoring, avoiding alcohol
symptoms_normalized: often asymptomatic for years, fatigue, jaundice, dark urine, abdominal pain, nausea, poor appetite, spider-like blood vessels on skin

symptoms: sudden high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, severe muscle and joint pain, rash, mild bleeding from nose or gums
treatment: rest, hydration, paracetamol for pain (avoid aspirin/ibuprofen), medical monitoring for warning signs
symptoms_normalized: sudden high fever, severe headache, pain behind the eyes, severe muscle and joint pain, rash, mild bleeding from nose or gums
normalized_symptoms_list: mild bleeding from nose or gums

symptoms: abrupt onset of fever, severe and often debilitating joint pain, muscle pain, headache, nausea, rash, fatigue
treatment: pain relievers, anti-inflammatory drugs (nsaids), rest, hydration, physical therapy for joint pain
symptoms_normalized: abrupt onset of fever, severe and often debilitating joint pain, muscle pain, headache, nausea, rash, fatigue
normalized_symptoms_list: severe and often debilitating joint pain

symptoms: sharp chest pain that worsens with deep breathing or coughing, productive cough with green/yellow phlegm, high fever, chills, shortness of breath
treatment: antibiotics (if bacterial), rest, plenty of fluids, oxygen therapy if severe
symptoms_normalized: sharp chest pain that worsens with deep breathing or cough, productive cough with green/yellow phlegm, high fever, chills, shortness of breath
normalized_symptoms_list: sharp chest pain that worsens with deep breathing or cough

symptoms: burning sensation during urination, frequent and intense urge to urinate, passing small amounts of urine, cloudy or strong-smelling urine, pelvic pain
treatment: antibiotics, increased fluid intake, cranberry juice or supplements for prevention
symptoms_normalized: burning sensation during urination, frequent and intense urge to urinate, passing small amounts of urine, cloudy or strong-smelling urine, pelvic pain
normalized_symptoms_list: frequent and intense urge to urinate

symptoms: watery diarrhea, vomiting, nausea, stomach cramps and pain, low-grade fever, headache, muscle aches
treatment: rest, aggressive hydration (oral rehydration solutions), bland diet (brat: bananas, rice, applesauce, toast)
symptoms_normalized: watery diarrhea, vomiting, nausea, stomach cramps and pain, low-grade fever, headache, muscle aches

symptoms: sudden sharp pain that begins around the navel and shifts to the lower right abdomen, pain that worsens with coughing or walking, nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, low-grade fever
treatment: emergency surgical removal of the appendix (appendectomy), antibiotics
symptoms_normalized: sudden sharp pain that begins around the navel and shifts to the lower right abdomen, pain that worsens with cough or walking, nausea, vomiting, loss of appetite, low-grade fever

pain that worsens with cough or walking

symptoms: sudden and severe pain in the upper right abdomen, pain between shoulder blades, nausea, vomiting, indigestion, fever
treatment: pain management, cholecystectomy (gallbladder removal surgery), medication to dissolve stones
symptoms_normalized: sudden and severe pain in the upper right abdomen, pain between shoulder blades, nausea, vomiting, indigestion, fever
normalized_symptoms_list: sudden and severe pain in the upper right abdomen

symptoms: severe, sharp pain in the side and back below the ribs, pain that radiates to the lower abdomen and groin, painful urination, pink/red/brown urine, nausea and vomiting
treatment: pain medication, hydration to pass stones, medical procedures like lithotripsy or ureteroscopy to break up or remove stones
symptoms_normalized: severe, sharp pain in the side and back below the ribs, pain that radiates to the lower abdomen and groin, painful urination, pink/red/brown urine, nausea and vomiting

symptoms: extreme fatigue, weakness, pale skin, shortness of breath, dizziness, headache, cold hands and feet, brittle nails
treatment: iron supplements, consuming iron-rich foods (red meat, spinach), addressing the underlying cause of blood loss
symptoms_normalized: extreme fatigue, weakness, pale skin, shortness of breath, dizziness, headache, cold hands and feet, brittle nails

symptoms: unexplained fatigue, weight gain, increased sensitivity to cold, constipation, dry skin, thinning hair, depression, muscle weakness
treatment: thyroid hormone replacement therapy (levothyroxine)
symptoms_normalized: unexplained fatigue, weight gain, increased sensitivity to cold, constipation, dry skin, thinning hair, depression, muscle weakness

symptoms: unintentional weight loss, rapid or irregular heartbeat (palpitations), anxiety and irritability, tremors in hands, heat intolerance, increased sweating, frequent bowel movements
treatment: anti-thyroid medications, radioactive iodine therapy, beta-blockers, surgery
symptoms_normalized: unintentional weight loss, rapid or irregular heartbeat (palpitations), anxiety and irritability, tremors in hands, heat intolerance, increased sweating, diarrhea

symptoms: pimples, blackheads, whiteheads on face/neck/chest/back, oily skin, cysts or nodules in severe cases
treatment: topical treatments (retinoids, benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid), oral medications (antibiotics, isotretinoin), good skincare hygiene
symptoms_normalized: pimples, blackheads, whiteheads on face/neck/chest/back, oily skin, cysts or nodules in severe cases
normalized_symptoms_list: cysts or nodules in severe cases

symptoms: dry, itchy, red, and inflamed skin, small raised bumps that may leak fluid, thickened or cracked skin
treatment: moisturizers and emollients, topical corticosteroids, antihistamines for itching, avoiding triggers
symptoms_normalized: dry, itchy, red, and inflamed skin, small raised bumps that may leak fluid, thickened or cracked skin
normalized_symptoms_list: small raised bumps that may leak fluid

symptoms: red, raised patches of skin with silvery scales, itching or burning sensation, dry and cracked skin that may bleed, pitted or thickened nails

symptoms_normalized: red, raised patches of skin with silvery scales, itching or burning sensation, dry and cracked skin that may bleed, pitted or thickened nails

symptoms: aching joint pain that worsens with activity, stiffness (especially in the morning or after rest), reduced range of motion, grating sensation (crepitus)
treatment: pain relievers (acetaminophen, nsaids), physical therapy, weight management, joint injections, joint replacement surgery
symptoms_normalized: aching joint pain that worsens with activity, stiffness (especially in the morning or after rest), reduced range of motion, grating sensation (crepitus)

symptoms: tender, warm, swollen joints (often symmetrical), joint stiffness worse in the morning, fatigue, fever, loss of appetite

symptoms_normalized: tender, warm, swollen joints (often symmetrical), joint stiffness worse in the morning, fatigue, fever, loss of appetite
normalized_symptoms_list: joint stiffness worse in the morning

symptoms: widespread musculoskeletal pain described as a dull ache, fatigue, sleep disturbances, cognitive difficulties ('fibro fog'), heightened sensitivity to pain
treatment: pain relievers, antidepressants, physical therapy, stress-reduction techniques (meditation, yoga)
symptoms_normalized: widespread musculoskeletal pain described as a dull ache, fatigue, sleep disturbances, cognitive difficulties ('fibro fog'), heightened sensitivity to pain
normalized_symptoms_list: widespread musculoskeletal pain described as a dull ache

symptoms: chronic abdominal pain or cramping, bloating and gas, diarrhea or constipation (or alternating between both), mucus in the stool

symptoms: frequent heartburn, regurgitation of food or sour liquid, chest pain, difficulty swallowing, feeling of a lump in your throat, chronic cough

symptoms: burning stomach pain, feeling of fullness, bloating or belching, fatty food intolerance, heartburn, nausea

symptoms_normalized: burning stomach pain, feeling of fullness, bloating or belching, fatty food intolerance, heartburn, nausea

symptoms: gradual loss of peripheral (side) vision, tunnel vision in advanced stages, halos around lights, eye pain and redness (in acute angle-closure glaucoma)

symptoms: cloudy or blurred vision, difficulty with vision at night, sensitivity to light and glare, seeing 'halos' around lights, fading or yellowing of colors
treatment: surgery to remove the cloudy lens and replace it with a clear, artificial intraocular lens (iol)
symptoms_normalized: cloudy or blurred vision, difficulty with vision at night, sensitivity to light and glare, seeing 'halos' around lights, fading or yellowing of colors

symptoms: pain, tenderness, and pressure around eyes, cheeks, nose, or forehead, nasal congestion, thick, discolored nasal discharge, reduced sense of smell and taste, headache

treatment: rest, plenty of fluids, humidifier, cough medicine, pain relievers (antibiotics are rarely needed)
symptoms_normalized: cough that produces mucus, chest soreness, fatigue, mild headache, muscle aches, sore throat

symptoms: red, swollen, warm, and painful area of skin, skin may appear pitted like an orange peel, fever, chills, blisters may form
treatment: oral or intravenous antibiotics, keeping the affected area elevated and clean

symptoms_normalized: bull's-eye rash (erythema migrans), fever, chills, fatigue, muscle aches, headache, neck stiffness

symptoms: sudden, severe attacks of pain, swelling, redness, and tenderness in one or more joints, most often in the big toe

symptoms_normalized: diarrhea, fever, fatigue, abdominal pain and cramping, blood in stool, mouth sores, reduced appetite and weight loss

symptoms: diarrhea, often with blood or pus, abdominal pain and cramping, rectal pain, urgency to defecate, fatigue, weight loss

symptoms_normalized: diarrhea, often with blood or pus, abdominal pain and cramping, rectal pain, urgency to defecate, fatigue, weight loss

symptoms: persistent sad or empty mood, loss of interest or pleasure in activities, significant weight change, insomnia or hypersomnia, fatigue, feelings of worthlessness, difficulty concentrating, suicidal thoughts

symptoms_normalized: tremor at rest (pill-rolling), slowness of movement (bradykinesia), limb rigidity, gait and balance problems, shuffling walk

symptoms: often asymptomatic, bone pain, muscle weakness, fatigue, mood changes

symptoms_normalized: sudden onset of severe vomiting, watery diarrhea, nausea, stomach cramps, low-grade fever, muscle pain

symptoms: abrupt onset of fever, myalgia (muscle aches), headache, malaise, non-productive cough, sore throat, and rhinitis
treatment: supportive care including rest and fluids, analgesics, antiviral medications like oseltamivir
symptoms_normalized: abrupt onset of fever, muscle aches (muscle aches), headache, malaise, dry cough, sore throat, and rhinitis

symptoms: watery diarrhea which may become bloody, abdominal cramps, nausea and vomiting, sometimes fever
treatment: rehydration is critical, rest, avoid anti-diarrheal medication as it can slow toxin removal, medical attention if bloody diarrhea or severe dehydration
symptoms_normalized: watery diarrhea which may become bloody, abdominal cramps, nausea and vomiting, sometimes fever
normalized_symptoms_list: watery diarrhea which may become bloody

symptoms: sudden sore throat, pain when swallowing, fever, red and swollen tonsils sometimes with white patches, tiny red spots on the roof of the mouth, swollen lymph nodes in the neck
treatment: antibiotics (penicillin or amoxicillin), pain relievers, rest, hydration
symptoms_normalized: sudden sore throat, sore throat, fever, red and swollen tonsils sometimes with white patches, tiny red spots on the roof of the mouth, swollen lymph nodes in the neck
normalized_symptoms_list: red and swollen tonsils sometimes with white patches
tiny red spots on the roof of the mouth
swollen lymph nodes in the neck

symptoms: swollen, red tonsils, white or yellow coating on tonsils, sore throat, difficulty swallowing, fever, swollen neck glands
treatment: rest, fluids, salt water gargles, pain relievers, antibiotics if bacterial
symptoms_normalized: swollen, red tonsils, white or yellow coating on tonsils, sore throat, difficulty swallowing, fever, swollen neck glands
normalized_symptoms_list: white or yellow coating on tonsils

symptoms: ear pain, fluid drainage from the ear, diminished hearing, fever, fussiness in infants
treatment: pain relievers, warm compress, antibiotics if bacterial and persistent
symptoms_normalized: ear pain, fluid drainage from the ear, diminished hearing, fever, fussiness in infants

symptoms: loud snoring, episodes in which you stop breathing during sleep, gasping for air during sleep, waking up with a dry mouth, morning headache, excessive daytime sleepiness (hypersomnia)
treatment: continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) machine, lifestyle changes (weight loss), oral appliances, surgery
symptoms_normalized: loud snoring, episodes in which you stop breathing during sleep, gasping for air during sleep, waking up with a dry mouth, morning headache, excessive daytime sleepiness (hypersomnia)
normalized_symptoms_list: episodes in which you stop breathing during sleep
waking up with a dry mouth

symptoms: an uncontrollable urge to move the legs, usually because of an uncomfortable sensation, symptoms worsen at rest and in the evening
treatment: lifestyle changes (regular exercise, sleep schedule), iron supplements if deficient, medications affecting dopamine
symptoms_normalized: an uncontrollable urge to move the legs, usually because of an uncomfortable sensation, symptoms worsen at rest and in the evening
normalized_symptoms_list: an uncontrollable urge to move the legs
usually because of an uncomfortable sensation
symptoms worsen at rest and in the evening

symptoms: difficulty falling asleep, difficulty staying asleep, waking up too early, not feeling well-rested after a night's sleep, daytime tiredness or sleepiness, irritability
treatment: cognitive behavioral therapy for insomnia (cbt-i), sleep hygiene improvement, prescription sleep medications (short-term)
symptoms_normalized: difficulty falling asleep, difficulty staying asleep, waking up too early, not feeling well-rested after a night's sleep, daytime fatigue or sleepiness, irritability
normalized_symptoms_list: not feeling well-rested after a night's sleep

symptoms: numbness, tingling, and pain in the hand and forearm, particularly in the thumb, index, and middle fingers, weakness in hand strength
treatment: wrist splinting, nsaids, corticosteroid injections, avoiding repetitive wrist motions, surgery in severe cases
symptoms_normalized: numbness, tingling, and pain in the hand and forearm, particularly in the thumb, index, and middle fingers, weakness in hand strength
normalized_symptoms_list: and pain in the hand and forearm

symptoms: joint pain, stiffness, and swelling, pain with movement or pressure, redness and warmth over the joint
treatment: rest, ice, pain relievers, corticosteroid injections, physical therapy
symptoms_normalized: joint pain, stiffness, and swelling, pain with movement or pressure, redness and warmth over the joint
normalized_symptoms_list: redness and warmth over the joint

symptoms: a dull ache, tenderness, and mild swelling near the affected tendon, pain that worsens with activity
treatment: rest, ice, compression, elevation (rice), pain relievers, physical therapy
symptoms_normalized: a dull ache, tenderness, and mild swelling near the affected tendon, pain that worsens with activity
normalized_symptoms_list: and mild swelling near the affected tendon

symptoms: stabbing pain in the bottom of your foot near the heel, pain is usually worst with the first few steps after awakening
treatment: rest, ice, stretching exercises, supportive shoes or orthotics, physical therapy
symptoms_normalized: stabbing pain in the bottom of your foot near the heel, pain is usually worst with the first few steps after awakening

symptoms: redness in one or both eyes, itchiness in one or both eyes, a gritty feeling in one or both eyes, discharge that forms a crust overnight, tearing
treatment: antibiotic eye drops (if bacterial), antihistamine eye drops (if allergic), artificial tears, warm or cool compresses
symptoms_normalized: redness in one or both eyes, itchiness in one or both eyes, a gritty feeling in one or both eyes, discharge that forms a crust overnight, tearing

symptoms: a red, painful lump near the edge of the eyelid that looks like a boil or a pimple, swelling of the eyelid, tearing
treatment: warm compresses, gentle massage, antibiotic ointment (if persistent), avoid squeezing or popping
symptoms_normalized: a red, painful lump near the edge of the eyelid that looks like a boil or a pimple, swelling of the eyelid, tearing

symptoms: fever, sore throat, feeling unwell, painful, red, blister-like lesions on the tongue, gums, and inside of the cheeks, a red rash on the hands and soles of the feet
treatment: supportive care, pain relievers, numbing mouthwashes or sprays, hydration
symptoms_normalized: fever, sore throat, feeling unwell, painful, red, blister-like lesions on the tongue, gums, and inside of the cheeks, a red rash on the hands and soles of the feet

symptoms: diarrhea, fatigue, weight loss, bloating and gas, abdominal pain, nausea, constipation, skin rash (dermatitis herpetiformis)
treatment: strict lifelong gluten-free diet, vitamin and mineral supplements
symptoms_normalized: diarrhea, fatigue, weight loss, bloating and gas, abdominal pain, nausea, constipation, rash (dermatitis herpetiformis)
